ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 144
ygData.msgSnippet: Aqua Lungs...well, they cost a ton to make. have a failure rate of like 50% (rally hurts) but you really wont be able to sell a charged item for too much. i
ygData.messageBody:
Aqua Lungs...well, they cost a ton to make. have a failure rate of like 50%
(rally hurts) but you really wont be able to sell a charged item for too
much. i sell em for around 400 which is an extreme deal, but then again i
have 6 on order right now and i can hardly keep up.
the charge bug..it is NOT fixed. i sold one lung to a very honorable guy and
he had one charge on it...my guess is that because his inventory wan not
redy to hold the Lung(it must be placed either in one of the regular
inventory slots OR a large box/Box of Abu Kar) well..his Lung dropped to the
ground during the trade..and this might have been the cause for the bug. i
dunno. i just make sure the ppl check the charges before AND after the
purchase.
-Ranth Rathan, Tarew Marr

on a lighter note...we just got a good friend of mine a Soulfire sword ;) he
looks DAMN COOL.
